channel.title: People on my server
channel.description: im a having a problem with people on my server but some people can get in and some other people cant!!...i got alot of complaints on my forum chat box dat that they coulnt get in but there were like small amount of people on..can anybody help me or sometihng plz.. thanks

item.title: People on my server
item.dc:creator: @shadowschool shadowschool
item.description:
@shadowschool wrote:

Nevermind the max players if its banning them, you probably have an autoban like i added into my server. This autoban most likely bans names with cusswords, illegal characters, 2+ spaces, etc. Look into this by searching client.java for IllegalUsernameChars().
Best of luck.

Read full topic

item.title: People on my server
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

There name could be blocked like the beggining or some letters, if not you probably have a bugged source try and get a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: People on my server
item.dc:creator: @shadowschool shadowschool
item.description:
@shadowschool wrote:

You may have your server set to a max amount of players, then a refusal to anyone who tries after the max has been reached. If this is a downloadable source, some releasers add these in just for a little attention.

Read full topic

item.title: People on my server
item.dc:creator: @xx_robie_xx xx robie xx
item.description:
@xx_robie_xx wrote:

im preety sure they arent blocked…but idk about if they typing the right ip…

Also when people get on it says a message saying

*server:is banning(name)…

without me banning em or nothing

Read full topic

item.title: People on my server
item.dc:creator: @mannn mannn
item.description:
@mannn wrote:

Ok,

Either they are typing wrong ip in or your server is down when they try and connect. Or there ip is blocked.

Read full topic
